passages.text:
You enter a small room filled with cold and stagnant air.  A small, wrinkled lump rests on the periphery of the bed, covered in ferns.

[[p:(Action) Inspect the lump.]]
[[p:Is that thing on the bed alive?]]

links.name: p:Is that thing on the bed alive?
links.link: p:Is that thing on the bed alive?

passages.name: Untitled Passage

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::So you feel it too...

[[p:Do you think this is...Angela?]]
passages.name: p:Is that thing on the bed alive?

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::This is her room.  And that lump's about the right size and shape for a toddler...

[[C->TV Turns on]]
passages.name: p:Do you think this is...Angela?

passages.text:
Your focus is interrupted by the tortured hiss of static.  The television set in the corner has sprung to life, along with the lamp that sits atop it.

[[C->footsteps]]
passages.name: TV Turns on

passages.text:
You concentrate your hearing.  The sound is faint but disturbingly clear: approaching footsteps.

Jasper,twisted::Hide!

[[p:(Action) Dive into the ferns in the corner.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Dive into the ferns in the corner.
links.link: p:(Action) Dive into the ferns in the corner.

passages.name: footsteps

passages.text:
You slither into the interior of a thick blanket of ferns suffocating the corner of the room nearest the entrance.  You can make out slices of the bedframe from your vantage point.

[[C->footsteps grow louder]]
passages.name: p:(Action) Dive into the ferns in the corner.

passages.text:
The footsteps grow louder.  The television begins to scream.

[[C->Julia enters.]]
passages.name: footsteps grow louder

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::...

Jasper::.....

Jasper::.......

Jasper,twisted::I think she's asleep.  Get out of here, now.

[[p:(Action) Quietly slip through the ferns and out of the room.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Quietly slip through the ferns and out of the room.
links.link: p:(Action) Quietly slip through the ferns and out of the room.

passages.name: planning escape

passages.text:
TAG

[[p:Whew.  That was close.]]
[[p:How did she get down here?->p:Whew.  That was close.]]

links.name: p:How did she get down here?

passages.name: p:(Action) Quietly slip through the ferns and out of the room.

passages.text:
Jasper,twisted::Shut up!

Jasper,head_tilted::We're still right outside her room.

Jasper,sad::Quickly, let's keep moving before she hears us.
passages.name: p:Whew.  That was close.
